name: Daily Transaction Report
query: SELECT t2.batch_name as Batch, t2.batch_category as BatchType,t1.batch_placed_on as Placement_Date,t1.transaction_date as Transaction_Date,t1.batch_live_quantity as Live_Quantity,t1.mortality_number_of_birds as Mortality,t1.feed_consumed_quantity as Feed,t1.feed_cost as Feed_Cost,t2.farmer_nameFROM `tabCBF Daily Transaction` AS t1INNER JOIN `tabCBF Batch` AS t2 ON t1.batch = t2.name
